text: int isgreater ( int a , int b ) { if ( a > b ) return 1 ; else return 0 ; } int main ( ) { int t , n , * a , i , cost ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; if ( t >= 1 && t <= 10 ) { while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; if ( n >= 2 && n <= 50000 ) { cost = 0 ; a = ( int * ) malloc ( sizeof ( int ) * n ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , a + i ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( isgreater ( * ( a + i ) , * ( a + i + 1 ) ) ) { cost += * ( a + i + 1 ) ; * ( a + i ) = 0 ; } else { cost += * ( a + i ) ; * ( a + i + 1 ) = 0 ; } } printf ( "%d\n" , cost ) ; } } } return 0 ; }
